entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023
